name: Gnomes & Goblins
description: Gnomes & Goblins is an original indie production from Wevr with MWMi and Golem Creations that offers players a unique opportunity to explore an enchanted virtual world created by Jon Favreau (director of The Lion King, The Jungle Book, Chef, Iron Man) in collaboration with VR Director Jake Rowell (theBlu, Call of Duty, Superman Returns).
